channel.title: Thinking Tools on Jeff Russell's Webstead
channel.description: Recent content in Thinking Tools on Jeff Russell's Webstead

item.title: Virtual Mentors
item.description: High performers frequently emphasize the importance of quality mentors, and we’ve all experienced the value of learning from people who have been there and done that. Finding a great mentor can be a big challenge, though. Luckily, you can benefit from the wisdom of impressive people with “virtual mentors”. Let’s talk about why to bother with this technique: finding and building a relationship with a top notch mentor is a big challenge.

item.title: Journaling as Thinking
item.description: Journaling doesn’t just mean recording your life for when you become super famous, you can accomplish a lot of different things by journaling. Sure, you absolutely can create a record for yourself and your family (and future biographers). You might instead want to get the neurotic and depressed thoughts out of your head and onto paper so that you can get on with business. Or perhaps you want to reinforce habits, like being grateful or generating ideas.
